text: Pust' ne schitayut nevernyye, chto prodolzhitel'naya zhizn' i mirskiye blaga, kotoryye My im dayom v blizhayshey zhizni, - blago dlya nikh. My dayom im dolguyu zhizn' i dayom bol'shoy udel tol'ko dlya togo, chtoby oni prodolzhali sovershat' svoi grekhi i byli dostoyny togo unizitel'nogo nakazaniya, kotoroye im ugotovil Allakh
